abilities.name: Foul Infusion
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

abilities.name: Explosive Maladies
abilities.description: Once per battle round, you can target one unit from your army with this ability with the Grenade Stratagem for 0CP.

abilities.name: Chaos Lord
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Desiccation Conduit (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within Contagion Range of this model, at the end of the turn, roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Death Guard Chaos Lord in Terminator Armour

abilities.name: Chaos Lord
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Desiccation Conduit (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within Contagion Range of this model, at the end of the turn, roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Grandfather’s Blessing (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit is within Contagion Range of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

name: Death Guard Daemon Prince with Wings

abilities.name: Warp Horror (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Devastating Assault
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, its hellforged weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Unclean Icon
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Seed the Disease
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of your next Command phase , this model’s unit is treated as having a Contagion Range of 12".

ranged.name: Curse of the Leper – focused witchfire

abilities.name: Putrescent Vitality (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, you can roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in this PSYKER’s unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Pestilent Familiar (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per battle, after selecting targets for a Psychic weapon equipped by this model, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that weapon by 2.

abilities.name: ignores
abilities.description: cover

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Putrefying Stink
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

abilities.description: Deep Strike, Leader

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Vector of Disease
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Abundance of Sickness
abilities.description: In the Fight phase, each time this model loses a wound, roll one D6: on a 4+, the closest enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.description: cover

abilities.name: lethal
abilities.description: hits

abilities.description: Strike

abilities.name: Nurgle’s
abilities.description: Gift (Aura)

abilities.name: Master of Destruction
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, you can re-roll the  Wound roll.

abilities.name: Blight Bombardment
abilities.description: Each time a friendly DEATH GUARD model makes an attack with a Blast weapon that targets a unit that is visible to this model, add 1 to the Hit roll and that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

abilities.name: Gift of Contagion (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER and roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your next Shooting phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Pestilent Fallout (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Plague Wind scored a wound against an enemy INFANTRY unit, until the start of your next turn, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Miasma of Pestilence (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Diseased Influence (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Toxic Presence (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 12" of this model, add 3" to the Contagion Range of that unit.

abilities.name: CORE
abilities.description: Deadly Demise D6, Deep Strike, Feel No Pain 5+

abilities.name: FACTION
abilities.description: Nurgle’s Gift (Aura)

abilities.name: Host of Plagues
abilities.description: At the start of the battle round, select one of the abilities in the Host of Plagues section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has that ability.

abilities.name: Lord of the Death Guard (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-6 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
abilities.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

abilities.name: Sickening Vitality
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: The Bell Tolls (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within Contagion Range of this model, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 2 from that test.

abilities.name: Tainted Narthecium
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

abilities.name: Diseased Healing
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY CHARACTER model within 3" of this model. That model regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

abilities.name: Malicious Calculations
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: The Seven-fold Chant
abilities.description: In your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, roll 2D6: on a 7+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: The Destroyer Hive
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: The Eater Plague (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability that are not part of an Attached unit and are not within 12" of this PSYKER) and roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

name: Chaos Lord On Palanquin Of Nurgle

abilities.name: Lord of Chaos
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Revolting Regeneration
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Gift of Poxes (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Feculent Despair (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock test, subtract 1 from that test.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift (Aura)
abilities.description: Remorseless: While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, each time you take a Battle-shock test for this unit, add 1 to that test.

abilities.name: Self Repair
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

abilities.description: ignores cover

abilities.name: Deadly Demise
abilities.description: D3

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Termite Assault
abilities.description: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Putrescent Fog (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is wholly within 6" of this FORTIFICATION, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Diseased Cover
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Fortification
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Blistering Fusillade
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, if it targets the closest eligible enemy unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Regenerating Monstrosities
abilities.description: At the start of each player’s Command phase, one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Scuttling Walker
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift (Aura)
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot or fight, after it has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is always considered to be within Contagion Range of this model.

abilities.name: Enraged Impact
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Helbrute Fists
abilities.description: If this model is equipped with two Helbrute fists, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: TRANSPORT
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 12 DEATH GUARD INFANTRY models (excluding CULTIST and POXWALKER models). Each TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise
abilities.description: D3

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Annihilator
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-4 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Destructor
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an INFANTRY unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-4 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Silent Bodyguard
abilities.description: While a CHARACTER model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than this unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.description: (Aura)

abilities.name: Hovering Death:
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Tank Hunters
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise
abilities.description: D3

abilities.name: Spore-laced Shock Waves
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Plagueburst mortar scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that INFANTRY unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Damaged
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Curse of the Walking Pox
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that destroys an enemy model (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models), you can return one destroyed Poxwalker model to this unit. While Typhus is leading this unit, enemy models destroyed as a result of TYPHUS’ The Eater Plague ability count as enemy models destroyed by an attack made by a model in this unit for the purposes of this ability.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift (Aura)
abilities.description: Infectious Bloodshed: Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Diseased Icon
abilities.description: Melee weapons in the bearer’s unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Mischief Makers (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: [LETHAL HITS]
abilities.description: Each time this unit shoots its Cerberus neutron pulse array in your Shooting phase, provided it Remained Stationary this turn, that weapon has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.description: Each time the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Rolling Fortress
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fellblade model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-8 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Line-breaker
abilities.description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

abilities.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.
